EmailTemplate.name: 18-Expand business-WAN Conn. Healthcare-3rd P Webinar-CCM Webinar-T0028H.Email -
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar today - The demands of a digital future in health care
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> You are invited to our webinar on August 21, 2018 at 2:00 PM ET Experts in digital transformation will join the Center for Connected Medicine (CCM) to present on the opportunities and challenges for health care organizations in the digital information age, offer practical solutions for addressing today’s digital transformation demands, and discuss the importance of real-time health systems. Key Learnings
- What are the key steps organizations should take to become real-time health systems? - Examples of real-time health system technologies implemented at UPMC. - Overcome manual processes and securely automate in the health care setting.
Read more about the Digital Transformation Webinar by visiting our blog <[[https://connectedmed.com/blog/content/digital-transformation-webinar-gartner-upmc-nokia]]>.
Register Now <[[https://zoom.us/webinar/register/8215325394814/WN_wYYpbL3FRCWwz2T3PQNZDg]]> Speakers Barry Runyon Vice President, Research Gartner Srinivasan Suresh MD, MBA Chief Information Officer UPMC Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh Chris Janson Senior Product Marketing Manager, Optical Networks
